summary: Bearer of the dragon blood, seek souls, seek the...
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=5]!!!Warning!!![/size][/color]
[font=Comic Sans MS]Please do not expect your game to be transformed into the dark series, this mod is still a work in progress as my skills develop, ive done voice sets to followers and now im going up the stairs for quest mod, so dont kill me because i didnt bring you what you wanted\expected from this mod -_-
[/font][color=#980000][size=4]
!!!Warning!!![/size][/color]
[font=Comic Sans MS][b][i][u]This mod is not for milk drinkers, or um the higher level for milk drinkers, you will die easy so prepare yourself before you get into a fight
I recommend you go alone, followers are going to die, youve been warned.[/u][/i][/b]
[/font]
[color=#660000][size=2]!!!WARNING!!![/size][/color]
[font=Times New Roman][font=Comic Sans MS]DO NOT GET HIT BY THE BOSSES, Just like in the souls series, you cannot get greedy with your attacks!
[color=#cccccc]Please shhh for other users :)[/color]

     Note: This mod is NOT lore friendly.
               Must be played on legendary difficulty, NPCs are going to have lower defense and base on your setup your mods may
               reduce their health, dealt damage, and increased damage against them if you select a lower difficulty, i have not
               touched the difficulty settings for compatibility reasons
               if you do however find a conflicting mod, let me know with screen shots :)



This mod adds some dark series npcs to skyrim, to start the adventure head to black reach where you will find your first invaders in front of
Sinderions Field Laboratory [color=#ffff00][size=4](See Images)[/size][/color] and then you will know where to find the rest, this is a unmarked quest, so you have to think, and you will find yourself to where the souls are being this mod has [color=#00ffff][size=3]no scripts[/size][/color][color=#00ff00] [u]so it is safe to remove anytime without any errors or save bloating[/u][/color], Ive checked the plugin many times to make sure it is compatible with everything, on my heavily modded game and without mods with the exception of required mods, if you have any problems please let me know, as this is a work in progress, and i want to expand this so any advice will be great :D

Rewards include: New summons, unique weapons and damn it im giving it away here, ehem and general FUN!  (More to come :)

Why i made this: For the past month ive been playing the souls series, and when i entered my first fight, i quickly realized that these enemies hit hard, so i thought no matter, im just level one so i will soon kill these fools easy, level 40 they still give me one hit death, and i realized, this game is not leveled base, its skill base, and i said why cant skyrim be like this, so i made this mod to try and bring some more fun\challenge to skyrim, so dont just rush an npc from this mod just like that, you have to plan and execute, know their weaknesses and use it to your advantage, the images dont show every npcs ingame so no spoilers, the npcs seen here are the first ones to encounter.
Other reason i made this, i really want to test myself and get better with the CK :) [/font]






[/font]
[color=#00ffff][size=4]Requirements (Masters)[/size][/color]
Dawnguard ~

[color=#00ff00][size=4]Requirements (Assets installed)[/size][/color]
[font=Comic Sans MS][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27644/?]Immersive Weapons[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19733/?]Immersive Armors[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]CBBE body[/url] (Some NPCS use the body so you need the body and the right skeleton, like [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPMSE[/url])

The required files [color=#00ff00][size=4](Assets installed)[/size][/color] are not masters to my mod, so you only need to run this along side immersive weapons and immersive armors, [color=#ffff00][size=4]Anyone can install this without them, but you will have missing textures without them[/size][/color], i try to make this mod with as much content, but takes up little space, so thats [color=#ff0000]ONE[/color] of the reasons i didnt make it a standalone mod sorry for any problems,[color=#ffff00] I will make a vanilla version. [/color]

I recommend you use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76529/?]Wild Cat - Combat of Skyrim[/url] mod as it makes them more smart, as in defending themselves and attacking.

Future Plans: A none scripted bonfire feature allowing players to trade souls for various items.
                     A Large worldspace for exploration\Story progression (currently in the making)    
                     More bosses and mini bosses
                     More unique items
                     More lore
                     Unquie souls that provide unquie abilities, or will just kill the player if he/she/it is too weak >:)
 
[color=#9900ff][size=4]Credits[/size][/color]
[color=#00ffff]Sotteta Necromancer Outfit
ApachiiHairFemale
Truebrows
Eyes of Amber
YMMP
Empyrean WarPaint
Immersive Armors
Immersive Weapons[/color]
[color=#d5a6bd]Friends from all over the world, thanks for your ideas and tips and advice im forever grateful to know people like you![/color]
Endorse my mod if you enjoyed it :) 
[color=#ffff00]This mod is for users who are 18+ just a warning for those younger ones who still want to keep a clean soul, or for those who care.[/color]
[/font]
[color=#ff0000]May your adventures be cold and deadly.[/color]
author: Delano
